snippet: Stocks closed higher after a steep loss the day before. Most Asian and European markets were closed for a holiday.
abstract: Stock market swings upward after sharp drop, despite flat growth and mixed earnings.
lead_paragraph: Stocks closed higher after a steep loss the day before. Most Asian and European markets were closed for a holiday.

headline.main: Market Rebounds After a Sharp Decline
headline.print_headline: Market Bounces Back Despite Stagnant Growth and Mixed Earnings
